Title: AquaMark
Description: AquaMark is a simple, user-friendly tool for adding custom text watermarks to images. It supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, and GIF formats, with drag-and-drop or file dialog selection, and lets you save watermarked images to your chosen location.

Title: PixelFit
Description: This is an Image Resizing Tool to help fix stretched or distorted in software SalesLogix. This simple application resizes any image to the correct format (16:9 aspect ratio, max 960 x 540) by automatically adding white padding so the images display clearly without distortion.

Title: CreditCard-Extract
Description: This tool allows users to upload multiple credit card statement PDFs and automatically extracts each transaction into a structured format. The extracted data can be reviewed and exported to Excel for further analysis or record keeping
